subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The presence of Glen Sather, the Rangers’ general manager who won five championship rings with the Oilers, lent a certain kind of old-fashioned hockey star power to media day.
snippet: The presence of Glen Sather, the Rangers’ general manager who won five championship rings with the Oilers, lent a certain kind of old-fashioned hockey star power to media day.
